title: Ep. 453: Doug Casey: The Speculator
itunes:title: Doug Casey: The Speculator
description: Welcome back to another episode of Wall Street Unplugged! Our guest is founder and chairman of Casey Research, Doug Casey. On this episode, Doug starts off by explaining why he believes an "inevitable" economic meltdown is around the corner. As Doug puts it, economic bubbles are forming in every financial market around us... except one. Lets face it, speculative investing is not for everyone. In the interview, however, Doug tells listeners how to follow his footsteps. Doug is the most successful speculative investor I know, so when he talks I listen. Tune in as Doug gives his bold forward looking predictions. You might not agree with everything… but like any risky investment, these are ideas that can give you extraordinary returns. Also, Doug gives us a sneak-peek of his new book Speculator. The story shares everything Doug has ever learned in the mining industry. This is a “must read” for every resource stock investor. Don’t miss out on this week’s Educational Segment [52:56]. After a slight fallout in the gold markets, analyst are thinking its time to sell. I’ll be telling you why this is good news. By the end of this segment you’ll know five of my favorite stocks for this upcoming quarter.
